Uses of Package
com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp

  • Packages that use com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp 
    Package Description
    com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp  
    com.att.research.xacml.std  
    com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp  
    com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.test.conformance  
  • Classes in com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp used by com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp 
    Class and Description
    PDPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    PDPEngineFactory
    PDPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating com.att.research.xacml.pep.PDPEngine instances.
    PDPException
    PEPException extends Exception to implement exceptions thrown by PDPEngine and PDPEngineFactory classes.
    ScopeQualifier
    ScopeQualifier enumerates the values of the "scope" attribute in requests.
    ScopeResolver
    ScopeResolver is the interface that objects implement that can be used to resolve attribute scopes to individual identifiers.
    ScopeResolverException
    ScopeResolverException is thrown by the ScopeResolver interface methods.
    ScopeResolverResult
    ScopeResolverResult is the interface for objects returned by the ScopeResolver's resolveScope method.
  • Classes in com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp used by com.att.research.xacml.std 
    Class and Description
    ScopeResolver
    ScopeResolver is the interface that objects implement that can be used to resolve attribute scopes to individual identifiers.
    ScopeResolverResult
    ScopeResolverResult is the interface for objects returned by the ScopeResolver's resolveScope method.
  • Classes in com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp used by com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp 
    Class and Description
    PDPEngine
    PEPEngine is the interface that applications use to make policy queries against a XACML 3.0 policy engine.
    PDPEngineFactory
    PDPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating com.att.research.xacml.pep.PDPEngine instances.
    PDPException
    PEPException extends Exception to implement exceptions thrown by PDPEngine and PDPEngineFactory classes.
    ScopeResolver
    ScopeResolver is the interface that objects implement that can be used to resolve attribute scopes to individual identifiers.
